title: BRIEF-India's Vikas WSP Seeks Fresh Preferential Issue To Raise Funds
text:
BRIEF-India's Vikas WSP Seeks Fresh Preferential Issue To Raise Funds

Stock Markets 38 minutes ago (Sep 25, 2019 12:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Vikas WSP Seeks Fresh Preferential Issue To Raise Funds Sept 25 (Reuters) - Vikas WSP Ltd VWSP.NS : * SAYS DUE TO CASH FLOW PROBLEMS SINCE 2013/14, CO UNABLE TO FETCH NEED-BASED EXPORT ORDERS FROM FOREIGN CUSTOMERS * SOUGHT THE RE-CONFIRMATION OF THE PREFERENTIAL ISSUE PROCESS DURING AGM * ISSUE WOULD ASSIST IN BOOSTING THE EXPORT SALES IN TIMES AHEAD * SAYS CURRENTLY UTILIZING JUST 20%-25% OF PRODUCTION CAPACITY DUE TO SHORTAGE OF FUNDS

BRIEF-India's Vikas WSP Seeks Fresh Preferential Issue To Raise Funds
description: BRIEF-India's Vikas WSP Seeks Fresh Preferential Issue To Raise Funds
